name: Contempt
description:
Contempt is my first game, made for a University project. Please know that I made this game alone over the course of a five weeks or so. I'd appreciate feedback of any kind :). 

Please play in fullscreen as some features do not scale well to smaller windows.

Also credit to Itch.io users Ansimuz and Fliflily, as well as OpenGameArt.org user Programmer16 for the art assets used in this game.

Thanks!!
